import React from 'react'; import './Login.css'; import '@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.css'; import { IonPage, IonContent, IonImg, IonInput, IonCheckbox, IonButton, IonItem, IonLabel } from '@ionic/react'; export interface EventHandlerProps { onClick: (e: React.MouseEvent) => void } function Login({ onClick }: EventHandlerProps) { function onFocus(e: React.FocusEvent) { console.log('Focused!', e.currentTarget); e.currentTarget.classList.add('disable-tabs'); } return(
